## install

```sh
pip3 install pipenv --user
```

*********************************************************************

## upgrade

```sh
pip3 install --user --upgrade pipenv
```

*********************************************************************

## check version

```sh
pipenv --version 
#pipenv, version 2023.11.17
```

*********************************************************************

## manage project dependencies

```sh
cd myproject

pipenv shell  # creates a virtual environment if one doesnâ€™t already exist
pipenv shell --/usr/local/bin/python3.12  # use a specific version

pipenv install <package>
```
